com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d

Interface EventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorGestureListener, ChangeListener, ClickListener, DragListener, DragScrollListener, FocusListener, InputListener, TextArea.TextAreaListener, TextField.TextFieldClickListener

    public interface EventListener
    Low level interface for receiving events. Typically there is a listener class for each specific event class.
    Author:
    Nathan Sweet
    See Also:
    InputListener, InputEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handle(Event event)
      Try to handle the given event, if it is applicable.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        boolean handle(Event event)
        Try to handle the given event, if it is applicable.
        Returns:
        true if the event should be considered handled by scene2d.
